Olga L. PERKINS, Appellant-Respondent,
v.
Robert E. PERKINS, Appellee-Petitioner. Court of Appeals Case No. 02A04-1711-DR-2787 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED April 5, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

RILEY , J.

Reversed and remanded.

MAY, J., Concurs.

MATHIAS, J., Concurs.
